article_node.title: Postman commits small act of kindness and becomes a ‘laundry hero’
article_node.summary: Gurpreet Singh, a postman in Logan, Australia, gained viral fame for his thoughtful act of saving a homeowner's laundry from rain by bringing it indoors instead of just delivering a package. Homeowner Verrity Wandel shared the heartwarming video on social media, leading to widespread praise for Singh, who is recognized for his kindness and service in line with his Sikh faith. The story has resonated with many, including actress Priyanka Chopra, highlighting the impact of small acts of kindness in the community.
